mapper.select: SELECT b_num, user_id, b_title, b_cont, b_cate, b_hit, CASE WHEN to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH')THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HHMI'))-to_number(to_char(reg_dt, 'HHMI'))||' '||'분 전' WHEN to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HH24')) -to_number(to_char(reg_dt, 'HH24')) ||' '||'시간 전' WHEN to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'DD')) -to_number(to_char(reg_dt, 'DD')) ||' '||'일 전' WHEN to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'MM')) -to_number(to_char(reg_dt, 'MM')) ||' '||'달 전' ELSE to_char(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') end reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt, bcount FROM board WHERE b_num = #{bNum}

SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT B.b_num, B.user_id, B.b_title, B.b_cont, B.b_cate, B.b_hit, CASE WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH')THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HHMI'))-to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'HHMI'))||' '||'분 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HH24')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'HH24')) ||' '||'시간 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'DD')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'DD')) ||' '||'일 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'MM')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'MM')) ||' '||'달 전' ELSE to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') end reg_dt, B.mod_id, B.mod_dt, B.rnum AS no, B.bcount, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM COMM WHERE B_NUM = B.b_num) as commentNo FROM ( SELECT bo.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt desc ) AS rnum FROM board bo )B WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM board WHERE b_cate = #{bCate} )Y

WHERE b_cate = #{bCate} )B WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM board WHERE b_cate = #{bCate} )Y

SELECT B.b_num, B.user_id, B.b_title, B.b_cont, B.b_cate, B.b_hit, CASE WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH')THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HHMI'))-to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'HHMI'))||' '||'분 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'HH24')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'HH24')) ||' '||'시간 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'DD')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'DD')) ||' '||'일 전' WHEN to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM') =to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') THEN to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'MM')) -to_number(to_char(b.reg_dt, 'MM')) ||' '||'달 전' ELSE to_char(b.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') end reg_dt, B.mod_id, B.mod_dt, B.rnum AS no, B.bcount, (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM COMM WHERE B_NUM = B.b_num) as commentNo FROM ( SELECT bo.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt desc ) AS rnum FROM board bo WHERE b_hit >= #{bHit} )B WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size})
